title: Peter.Jackson's.King.Kong.The.Official.Game.of.the.Movie.Gamer's
description:
Peter.Jackson's.King.Kong.The.Official.Game.of.the.Movie.Gamer's.Edition.v1.0.multi10.retail-THETA

 

INFORMATION: 

Released: November 21, 2005 
Genre: Action / Adventure 
Developer: Ubisoft Montpellier 
Publisher: Ubisoft Entertainment 
Publication Type: License 
Language: English, German, French, Spanish, Italian etc. 
Language: English 
Tablet: Not required 

MINIMUM SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS: 

Operating system: Windows XP / Vista / 7 
Processor: Intel Pentium IV - 3,0 GHz / AMD Athlon 64 - 2,0 GHz 
Memory: 1 GB 
Video: 256 MB (GeForce 6800 GT / Radeon X1600 XT) 
Sound card: compatible with DirectX9.0c 
Optional: keyboard and mouse 
Free hard drive space: 6 GB 

GAME DESCRIPTION: 

Created based on the eponymous movie, the game Peter Jackson's King Kong will reveal to you 
mysterious and unknown world Skull Island. Developers Beyond Good and Evil and Splinter Cell have created 
incredibly atmospheric game, which undoubtedly will have to appeal to both adventure lovers, 
action and thirsty players. Game Peter Jackson's King Kong is ready to offer not only impeccable 
graphics, but also new possibilities of gameplay, combining FPS, third-person shooter and 
elements of the fighting game: you have to fight not only for the actor Jack Driscoll, but also 
to visit a skin of the King Kong! 
Together with the other heroes of this incredible adventure you will visit a prehistoric jungle 
settlement of aboriginal tribe worshiping a giant gorilla, and explore the ruins of the city 
unknown civilization. This game will not let you get bored!
